properties.markdownProperty:
Multiples files are supported in order to make easier organizing translations. The content of the YAML/YML file must be a simple mapping `code.string:"translation"`.
- `string` represents the string written in the XML file lowered and spaces replaced by underscores `_`. If the name contains ':' you can wrap the whole `code.string` around ''. - `code` is the translation code defined by the system to handle different type of translation (archetype property names, categories, etc)
These are the predefined codes for each type of archetype translation that the system can handle:
- Archetype category - `archetype.category` (Archetype category directory name without XX_ prefix, shown in archetype menu tab). - Archetype classes - `archetype.class` (Archetype classes attribute shown in main menu archetype tab and add trace dialog). - Property names - `archetype.prop_name` (Property name attribute shown in property dialog). - Property categories - `archetype.prop_category` (Property category attribute shown in property dialog) - Property tooltips - `archetype.tooltip` (Property tooltip attribute shown in property dialog). - enumProperty choices - `archetype.enum_choices` (Property choices attribute shown in property dialog).
